name: RichardsonTheatre
0:
”Alexa, ask richardson theatre what is the movie this weekend”
”Alexa, ask richardson theatre what movie is playing”
”Alexa, ask richardson theatre what movies are upcoming”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: richardson theatre
des:
Use this skill to receive upcoming movies playing at the Richardson Theatre in Scobey, MT.

Just ask "What movie is playing this weekend?" or "What movie is playing next weekend?".
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
